Disease.description: Type of disease the patient is diagnosed with

Fever.description: Whether the patient has a fever or not

value_dict.No: The patient does not have a fever

Cough.description: Whether the patient has a cough or not

value_dict.No: The patient does not have a cough

Fatigue.description: Whether the patient feels fatigue or not

value_dict.No: The patient does not feel fatigue

Difficulty Breathing.description: Whether the patient has difficulty breathing or not

value_dict.No: The patient does not have difficulty breathing

Age.description: Age of the patient in years

Blood Pressure.description: Blood pressure level of the patient

value_dict.Low: The patient has low blood pressure
value_dict.Normal: The patient has normal blood pressure
value_dict.High: The patient has high blood pressure

value_dict.Normal: The patient has normal cholesterol level
value_dict.Low: The patient has low cholesterol level
value_dict.High: The patient has high cholesterol level

Outcome Variable.description: Outcome of the disease, whether positive or negative

value_dict.Positive: The outcome of the disease is positive
value_dict.Negative: The outcome of the disease is negative
